text: Ariana Grande and Pete Davidson may not have officially confirmed their engagement yet, but that hasn't stopped the new couple from being open about their love on Instagram. The 24 - year - old singer and 24 - year - old Saturday Night Live star have recently shared several videos and photos of their time together on social media, including some that had guest star appearances from THAT ring. On Friday, Davidson posted a photo showing his and her hands and feet intertwined, with a big engagement ring on display.
